name: Awesome Newborn Baby and Mommy Doctor Care
name_original: Awesome Newborn Baby and Mommy Doctor Care
description:
Enjoy and embrace this awesome adventure to motherhood. Take care of your Newborn Baby and most important, take care of Mommy.

This is a a casual and fun story game for kids and girls. Play it for yourself.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Newborn Baby and Mommy Doctor Care is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
